alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:31PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cochise County through 515 PM MST... At 431 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Douglas, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Bisbee-Douglas Airport and Pirtleville. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 360 and 378. Route 191 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
